column1: Table A-52:  Consumption and Carbon Content Coefficients of Liquefied Petroleum Gases, 1990-2014

Sources: Fuel use of LPG based on data from EIA (2009b) and API (1990 through 2007).  Non-fuel use of LPG from API (1990 through 2008). Volumes converted using the energy contents provided in Table A-51. C contents from EPA (2010).
